sentences.en: From whence they went to the fatal tree.
sentences.cn: 从那里他们走上绞刑架.

sentences.en: He knows neither his whence nor his whither.
sentences.cn: 他不知道从哪里来,到哪里去.

sentences.en: He leapt on a rock, from whence he could behold the sea.
sentences.cn: 他跳到一块可以观望大海的岩石上.

sentences.en: He went to the place whence he had come.
sentences.cn: 他到他原先来的那个地方.

sentences.en: I walked to Rainbagh, whence I could complete the journey by car.
sentences.cn: 我步行至雷恩巴夫，从那里我可以开车走完全程。

sentences.en: It was near the thickest whence the raft had issued.
sentences.cn: 这正是树林最茂盛浓密的地方,也正是木筏的出发地点.

sentences.en: Let him return to the place whence he came.
sentences.cn: 让他回到他所来的地方.

sentences.en: Let him return whence he came.
sentences.cn: 让他回到他来的那个地方.

sentences.en: Or , if not, thou strange and elfish child, whence didst thou come? "
sentences.cn: 要不是这样, 你这个怪里怪气的小妖精似的孩子是从哪儿来的? ”

sentences.en: She advanced to the window whence the rays of light proceeded.
sentences.cn: 她朝着发出灯光的那扇窗户走过去.

sentences.en: They returned whence they had come.
sentences.cn: 他们从哪里来又回到哪里去了。

sentences.en: They returned whence they had come.
sentences.cn: 他们回到他们来的那地方.

sentences.en: We know neither our whence nor our whither.
sentences.cn: 我们不知道从哪里来到哪里去.

sentences.en: Whence no flight of Birds could be Blown into Wu.

trans.tran_cn: 从何处，从那里，（到）…的地方，出于什么原因
